title: @nx-dotnet/core:move
description: Moves {projectName} to {destination}. Renames the Nx project to match the new folder location. Additionally, updates any .csproj, .vbproj, .fsproj, or .sln files which pointed to the project.

projectName.description: Name of the project to move
projectName.x-prompt: What name would you like to use?

destination.description: Where should it be moved to?
destination.x-prompt: What name would you like to use?

relativeToRoot.description: If true, the destination path is relative to the root rather than the workspace layout from nx.json
